src:
绿驰通讯与中国移动签MoU 探讨彼此的产品分销
01 Nov 2019, 11:57 by Ahmad Naqib Idris
（吉隆坡1日讯）绿驰通讯（Green Packet Bhd）与中国移动通信集团设备有限公司（China Mobile Group Device Co Ltd）签署谅解备忘录（MoU），以寻求双方推广和分发彼此产品和服务的机会。
这家中国公司是国有的中国移动通信集团有限公司（China Mobile Communications Group Co Ltd）的子公司，其其他子公司包括中国最大的电信公司中国移动有限公司（China Mobile Ltd）。
绿驰通讯表示，谅解备忘录的有效期为1年，但经双方同意可续签。
除了推广和分发产品外，绿驰通讯和中国移动集团设备还将提供销售和服务援助，并提供技术支持和服务。
绿驰通讯预计，一旦双方达成最终协议，将对其业务做出积极贡献。
闭市时，绿驰通讯跌0.5仙或0.68%，至73仙，市值为6亿7931万令吉。
（编译：魏素雯）

English version：Green Packet inks MoU with China Mobile to look into distributing each other’s products

Via theedgemarkets.com
text:
Green Chi Communications and China Mobile Sign MoU to discuss each other's product distribution
01 Nov 2019, 11:57 by Ahmad Naqib Idris
KUALA LUMPUR (April 1): Green Packet Bhd has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with China Mobile Group Device Co Ltd to seek opportunities to promote and distribute each other's products and services.
The Chinese company is a subsidiary of the state-owned China Mobile Communications Group Co Ltd. Its other subsidiaries include China Mobile Ltd, China's largest telecommunications company.
Green Packet said that the memorandum of understanding is valid for one year, but can be renewed with mutual consent.
In addition to promoting and distributing products, Green Packet and China Mobile Group equipment will also provide sales and service assistance and provide technical support and services.
Green Packet Communications expects to make a positive contribution to its business once the parties reach a final agreement.
At the close of the market, Green Chi Communications fell 0.5 sen or 0.68% to 73 sen, with a market value of RM 793.31 million.
(Compile: Wei Suwen)

English version:Green Packet inks MoU with China Mobile to look into distributing each other’s products

Via theedgemarkets.com
